item.title: Gift
item.description: She started small. At first, it was dark, with nothing more than a sensation of a cool breeze against her skin. She pulled her arms and legs close, as they were the only real things she could feel. Her world was silent and lonely, although she couldnâ€™t yet know. Her awareness was yet a small bud. After a time, she noticed a glint at the edge of her vision, a focused, mild glow from above.
